description: "Sumatra and the Malay Peninsula feature on this map of the Indian Ocean. Enganno Island, west of southern Sumatra, has a label that translates as ‘inhabited by very pernicious savages’. An inset map depicts the Madura Strait between Java and Madura."
title: "Partie   de   la   nouvelle   Grande   Cartes   des   Indes   Orientales,   contenant   les   Isles   Maldives,   Ceylan,   Malacca,   Sumatra   etc"
